title: AsyncStatus
description: An Asynchronous task status in Vitam DSL

id.description: Unique identifier of the asynchronous task.

start_date.description: Start date of the asynchronous task.

end_date.description: End date of the asynchronous task (may be null).

expiration_date.description: Expiration date of the asynchronous task result (may be null).

result_link.description: Link to the asynchronous task result (may be null), default being same_uri/result.

error.description: Error information of the asynchronous task.
